author: @jono601
text: 256 gb is a bit too low. you constantly have to watch out for large apps and downloads. I find this micromanaging of storage unproductive and not worth the savings if you use it for work. Just get the 500 gb option so you don't have to watch your internal storage like a hawk. Hanging a storage drive off your computer is fine if you keep your laptop on your desk all the time. just note there's only 2 ports so even less reason to permanently plug up one of the ports with a hanging storage drive. Just be prepared to be constantly stressed about storage if you get the 256gb one.
